items.name: Voltaxic Rift
enchantMods: Quality does not increase Physical Damage
Grants 1% increased Elemental Damage per 2% Quality
explicitMods: Adds 1 to 725 Lightning Damage
15% increased Attack Speed
100% of Lightning Damage Converted to Chaos Damage

flavourText: The eldritch storm descended upon us, and bruised lightning
rained down. Metal withered and flesh melted before its
arcane power. There was no escape, no shelter. Only despair.
